sentences.en: a leader who will shape the organization’s future
sentences.cn: 将决定该组织未来的一位领导者

sentences.en: Both had successful careers and the future looked bright.
sentences.cn: 两个人都事业有成，前程似锦。

sentences.en: Does this school have a future?
sentences.cn: 这所学校有前途吗？

sentences.en: Don't worry, Uncle Tim, your future is safe in our hands.
sentences.cn: 别担心，蒂姆大叔，你将来由我们照顾。

sentences.en: He believes food prices will go up in the future.
sentences.cn: 他认为食品价格将来会上涨。

sentences.en: He has staked his political future on an election victory.
sentences.cn: 他把自己的政治前途押在竞选获胜上。

sentences.en: His future as prime minister depends on the outcome of the elections.
sentences.cn: 他能否继续坐在首相的位子上取决于选举的结果。

sentences.en: I made a silent vow to be more careful in the future.
sentences.cn: 我暗暗发誓，日后要倍加小心。

sentences.en: In the future the machines will need spare parts and maintenance.
sentences.cn: 这些机器将来会需要备件和维修保养。

sentences.en: Read these notes carefully and keep them for future reference.
sentences.cn: 仔细阅读这些注释并将其保留下来以备将来之用。

sentences.en: she would be more careful in future.
sentences.cn: 她今后会更细心。

sentences.en: So, might they finally have free elections in the foreseeable future?
sentences.cn: 那么，他们最终会在不久的将来举行自由选举吗？

sentences.en: Students all over the country are facing an uncertain future.
sentences.cn: 全国各地学生前途未卜。

sentences.en: the debate over the future development of the European Union
sentences.cn: 关于欧盟未来发展的辩论

sentences.en: The details are filed away by his three secretaries for future reference.
sentences.cn: 他的3个秘书已经把详细情况归档备查。

sentences.en: The future for manned space flight is looking increasingly uncertain.
sentences.cn: 载人宇宙飞行的前景看上去充满了越来越多的变数。

sentences.en: The islands should have the right to decide their own future.
sentences.cn: 这些岛屿应当有权决定自己的未来。

sentences.en: There's no work and no future for students like himself.
sentences.cn: 像他这样的学生既找不到工作，也看不到前途。

sentences.en: Those are nice academic arguments, but what about the immediate future?
sentences.cn: 那些是微妙的学术上的辩论，但不久的将来怎么办？

sentences.en: We are now more able to predict future patterns of climate change.
sentences.cn: 我们现在更有能力预测未来气候的变化模式了。

sentences.en: We wondered what the future would hold for our baby son.
sentences.cn: 我们不知道宝贝儿子长大了会怎样。

sentences.en: We’ve been able to save this land from development and preserve it for future generations .
sentences.cn: 我们保全了这块土地，没有去开发，而是把它留给子孙后代。

sentences.en: What are your plans for the future?
sentences.cn: 你未来有什么打算？

words.tran_cn: 没有前途的；没有希望的
未来主义者；未来派画家

phrases.tran_cn: 光明的未来，光明的前途
未来的发展前景，未来发展
n. 发展前景；光明的前途

trans.tran_en: likely to happen or exist at a time after the present

trans.tran_cn: 未来，前途，未来的事，期货
trans.tran_en: what someone or something will do or what will happen to them in the future
